languages.text: "Ответ отрицательный. Единицы, идентифицировавшие себя как исповедальный патруль, //совершили вторжение//посещали нас//. Они были проинформированы, что члены Адептус Механикус не находятся в поле их юрисдикции. Затем состоялся теологический диспут". {n}Техножрец загадочно умолкает.{/n}

"Negative. Units that identified themselves as confessors did indeed //perform an intrusion//approach us//. They were informed that members of the Adeptus Mechanicus exist outside their jurisdiction. A theological dispute followed." {n}Opticon-22 falls into a cryptic silence.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ответ отрицательный. Единицы, идентифицировавшие себя как исповедальный патруль, //совершили вторжение//посещали нас//. Они были проинформированы, что члены Адептус Механикус не находятся в поле их юрисдикции. Затем состоялся теологический диспут". {n}Техножрец загадочно умолкает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Negative. Units that identified themselves as confessors did indeed perform an intrusion/approach us. They were informed that members of the Adeptus Mechanicus exist outside their jurisdiction. A theological dispute followed." {n}Opticon-22 falls silent enigmatically.{/n}

languages.text: 「否。聴罪師と名乗るユニットは、確かに//侵入//接近//してきました。彼らは帝国技術局の職員が、彼らの管轄外に存在することを知らされ、その後、神学的紛争が繰り広げられました」{n}オプティコン-22は不可解な沈黙に陥った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Negative. Units that identified themselves as confessors did indeed //perform an intrusion//approach us//. They were informed that members of the Adeptus Mechanicus exist outside their jurisdiction. A theological dispute followed." {n}Opticon-22 falls into a cryptic silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「否。聴罪師と名乗るユニットは、確かに//侵入//接近//してきました。彼らは帝国技術局の職員が、彼らの管轄外に存在することを知らされ、その後、神学的紛争が繰り広げられました」{n}オプティコン-22は不可解な沈黙に陥った。{/n}

languages.text: “否认。那些认为自己是告解者的单位确实曾明确地//入侵//接近我们//。他们被告知，机械修会的成员并不在他们的管辖范围之内，随后双方展开了一场神学方面的争论。”{n}奥普蒂孔22号陷入了意义不明的沉默。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Negative. Units that identified themselves as confessors did indeed //perform an intrusion//approach us//. They were informed that members of the Adeptus Mechanicus exist outside their jurisdiction. A theological dispute followed." {n}Opticon-22 falls into a cryptic silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “否认。那些认为自己是司祭的单位确实曾明确地//入侵//接近我们//。他们被告知，机械修会的成员并不在他们的管辖范围之内，随后双方展开了一场神学方面的争论。”{n}奥普蒂孔22号陷入了意义不明的沉默。{/n}

languages.text: «Negativo. Recibimos //una intrusión//un acercamiento// por parte de unidades que se identificaron como confesores. Se les informó de que los miembros del Adeptus Mechanicus existen fuera de su jurisdicción. Siguió una disputa teológica». {n}Opticon-22 cae en un críptico silencio.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Negative. Units that identified themselves as confessors did indeed //perform an intrusion//approach us//. They were informed that members of the Adeptus Mechanicus exist outside their jurisdiction. A theological dispute followed." {n}Opticon-22 falls into a cryptic silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Negativo. Recibimos //una intrusión//un acercamiento// por parte de unidades que se identificaron como confesores. Se les informó de que los miembros del Adeptus Mechanicus existen fuera de su jurisdicción. Siguió una disputa teológica». {n}Opticon-22 cae en un críptico silencio.{/n}

languages.text: « Négatif. Les unités se qualifiant de "confesseurs" ont en effet tenté //une intrusion//de nous aborder//. Elles ont été informées que les membres de l'Adeptus Mechanicus opéraient hors de leur juridiction. Un litige théologique s'est ensuivi. » {n}Opticon-22 n'en dit pas plus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Negative. Units that identified themselves as confessors did indeed //perform an intrusion//approach us//. They were informed that members of the Adeptus Mechanicus exist outside their jurisdiction. A theological dispute followed." {n}Opticon-22 falls into a cryptic silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Négatif. Les unités se qualifiant de "confesseurs" ont en effet tenté //une intrusion//de nous aborder//. Elles ont été informées que les membres de l'Adeptus Mechanicus opéraient hors de leur juridiction. Un litige théologique s'est ensuivi. » {n}Opticon-22 n'en dit pas plus.{/n}

languages.text: "Negativ. Einheiten, die sich selbst Konfessoren nannten, //wurden übergriffig//traten an uns heran//, das stimmt. Sie wurden informiert, dass Mitglieder des Adeptus Mechanicus außerhalb ihrer Zuständigkeit stehen. Es kam zu einem theologischen Disput." {n}Opticon-22 verfällt in kryptisches Schweigen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Negative. Units that identified themselves as confessors did indeed //perform an intrusion//approach us//. They were informed that members of the Adeptus Mechanicus exist outside their jurisdiction. A theological dispute followed." {n}Opticon-22 falls into a cryptic silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Negativ. Einheiten, die sich selbst Konfessoren nannten, //wurden übergiffig//traten an uns heran//, das stimmt. Sie wurden informiert, dass Mitglieder des Adeptus Mechanicus außerhalb ihrer Zuständigkeit stehen. Es kam zu einem theologischen Disput. {n}Opticon-22 verfällt in kryptisches Schweigen.{/n}

languages.text: "Olumsuz. Kendilerini günah çıkaran olarak tanımlayan birimler //ihlal gerçekleştirdi//bize yaklaştı//. Adeptus Mechanicus mensuplarının, günah çıkaranların yetki alanına girmediklerine dair bilgilendirildiler. Teolojik bir anlaşmazlık yaşandı. " {n}Opticon-22, gizemli bir sessizliğe bürünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Negative. Units that identified themselves as confessors did indeed //perform an intrusion//approach us//. They were informed that members of the Adeptus Mechanicus exist outside their jurisdiction. A theological dispute followed." {n}Opticon-22 falls into a cryptic silence.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Olumsuz. Kendilerini günah çıkaran olarak tanımlayan birimler //yetkisiz giriş gerçekleştirdi//bize yaklaştı//. Adeptus Mechanicus üyelerinin onların yetki alanları dışında var olduklarına dair bilgilendirilmişler. Teolojik bir anlaşmazlık yaşandı. "{n}Opticon-22, gizemli bir sessizliğe bürünüyor.{/n}
